pageTitleMortgageJoint: Do you share the mortgage for the place where you live with anyone other than your partner?
pageTitleRentSingle: Do you share the rent for the place where you live with anyone?
pageTitleRentJoint: Do you share the rent for the place where you live with anyone other than your partner?

pageTitleEitherJoint: Do you share the rent or mortgage for the place where you live with anyone other than your partner?

shareRentMortgage.requiredMortgageSingle: Select yes if you share the mortgage with anyone.
shareRentMortgage.requiredRentSingle: Select yes if you share the rent with anyone.
shareRentMortgage.requiredEitherSingle: Select yes if you share the rent or mortgage with anyone.
shareRentMortgage.requiredMortgageJoint: Select yes if you share the mortgage with anyone other than your partner.
shareRentMortgage.requiredRentJoint: Select yes if you share the rent with anyone other than your partner.
shareRentMortgage.requiredEitherJoint: Select yes if you share the rent or mortgage with anyone other than your partner.
